metadata.dc:author: Rioja Sanz, L A
Allepuz Losa, C
Carela, J
Benejam, J
García-Miralles, R
Sanz, J I
metadata.dc:description: Presentation and analysis of results from an early diagnosis program for prostate cancer in symptomatic patients. Output of density-PSA (PASD-d), density-PSA of the transitional area (PSAD-ad) and free PSA/total PSA ratio, applied to patients with total PSA between 4 and 10 ng/ml is analyzed.
metadata.dc:title: Aportación del PSAD y PSA-AD en el diagnóstico precoz del cáncer de próstata.
[PSAD and PSA-AD in the early diagnosis of cancer of the prostate].
